answers.answer: Only gained 12lbs with my first.  Don't worry as long as you're eating healthy and on a regular basis.  My Dr told me i don't need to gain a lot of weight as long as the babies growing.  (Btw -I'm not overweight -normal bmi)
Thanks, cause I have been worrying.....
I am 30 weeks and the only place that is expanding is my belly. Probably a good thing after baby it won't be so hard for us to get back to regular weight...
Your bb is fine im 30 weeks n ive only gained 17 lbs with my first i gained 50 n my second bb i gained 25 lbs n if ur doc doesnt say anything about ur weight then ur fine.

I just found out I have gestational diabetes and have to change my diet completely. My Dr and nutrionist said I will continue to lose weight (I'm down about 20 pounds because of 1st trimester vomiting). If you're concerned ask your doctor but I'm sure if there was anything for you to worry about your doctor would inform you.

Ive lost 1 pound from my pre pregnancy weight and im 37 weeks the baby is around 6lbs 6 oz right now from my ultrasound 2 days ago  im just one of the lucky ones that loose as baby gains maybe you are to and you only need an extra 300 calories while pregnant

question: I am 25 weeks, but I am worried that I haven't really been picking up any weight. My baby is moving around a lot. I just want to make sure my baby is just fine.
title: weight
